department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
description: Solicitation:  T8493-230010 (i) The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. (ii) Documents may be submitted in English or French.
full_summary:
### Mandatory Solicitation - Acquisition of Air Cycle Machine

#### Solicitation Details
* **Solicitation Title**: Acquisition of Air Cycle Machine
* **Trade Agreement**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Procurement Category**: Goods ( GD )
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-07-28T14:00:00
* **Procurement Documents**: Will be sent directly to qualified suppliers via email.

#### Background
The solicitation is for the acquisition of an air cycle machine ( PN: 738384-26 ) for Transport Canada's Citation 550 aircraft. The solicitation is limited to qualified supply arrangement holders for the T8493-140035 series.

#### Instructions to Suppliers
Qualified suppliers who wish to participate in this solicitation should submit their proposals electronically to [ the contact information listed below ].

#### Contact Information
The contracting authority for this solicitation is:

Edmond Egikian
Acquisitions Branch
Land and Aerospace Equipment Procurement and Support Sector ( LAEPSS )
Public Services and Procurement Canada ( PSPC ) / Government of Canada
11 Laurier St. - PDP III, 8C1, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
Phone: (343) 572-4437
Email: [ edmond.egikian@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca ](mailto:edmond.egikian@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Delivery Date
The delivery date for this requirement is April 8, 2023.

#### Additional Information
The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. The Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) is not responsible for the distribution of the procurement documents.

#### Ongoing Opportunity for Qualification
A notice will be posted at least once a year on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) to allow more suppliers to become qualified for the supply arrangement T8493-140035 Series. Suppliers wishing to become qualified should submit their request to:

Oliver Morones, Supply Specialist
Acquisitions Branch
Land and Aerospace Equipment Procurement and Support Sector ( LAEPSS )
Public Services and Procurement Canada ( PSPC ) / Government of Canada
11 Laurier St. - PDP III, 7C2, Gatineau, QC K1
